column4: I have 80 GB of backups, they are multiple files in folders and stuff. Do you know if there is a way to list all files, and check for duplicates, before synchronizing?
unfortinately i dont know how to detect multiple files with rsync, i basically use this line rsync -r --del -u /bigmutha/music /sdc1/removable --progress
which does what? Only copy the differences, or erases the old ones? Care to explain a little?
it will copy new files across or if a file has been modified ie corrected a tag ect it will copy the newer file and delete the old file in the backup.
